1.content: Integrate Core Products (Stripe) into Analytics Dashboard
1.details:
1. Add Stripe API integration to fetch 28 Core Products data
2. Combine Core Products + Catalog Products analytics
3. Weight Core Products higher in all calculations (70% importance)
4. Add dual product architecture visualization
5. Show revenue split between Core vs Catalog products

2.content: Enhanced Customer Intelligence with Dual Product System
2.details:
1. Segment customers by Core vs Catalog purchase behavior
2. Identify 'Style Leaders' (Core product purchasers)
3. Track conversion paths: Catalog browsers â†’ Core buyers
4. Add high-value customer cohort analysis
5. Implement customer lifetime value based on product mix

3.content: Training Data Optimization for Fashion Knowledge Base
3.details:
1. Create weighted training data structure (Core 70%, Catalog 30%)
2. Map PostHog behavioral signals to product types
3. Build style affinity patterns between Core + Catalog products
4. Generate event-driven recommendation training data
5. Create fashion personality profiles based on dual product system
